title: New Powerball Odds Could Give America Its First Billion-Dollar Jackpot FiveThirtyEight » Features | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: New York state lottery commissioners approved a proposed rule Monday that would change the Powerball lottery jackpot odds. Assuming the rest of the Powerball stakeholders get on board (and they have to in order to remain in the Powerball system), the move will make it even less likely that you could win the jackpot.
